definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
to incline/to lean/to slant/to slope/to tilt
not to glance sideways (idiom)/to gaze fixedly/to be fully concentrated/to preserve a correct attitude

sentences.english: To reach it, shoppers will descend into the ground on broad ramps.
sentences.chinese: 達到它，購物者將降落到地面就廣泛的斜道。

sentences.english: The mourners around me give me sideways glances or just stare.
sentences.chinese: 我周圍的哀悼者斜着瞥我一眼或者乾脆直盯着我看。

sentences.english: You should not be tilted sideways, backward, or forwards.
sentences.chinese: 你不能斜傾，後仰或前傾。

sentences.english: Sophie said, as the car lurched down the road.
sentences.chinese: 汽車東歪西斜地開上公路，索菲問。

sentences.english: He cut the ball so that it bounded almost backward.
sentences.chinese: 他斜削這個球，使其幾乎向後彈起。

sentences.english: The gulls went in slanting flight up the wind toward the gray desolate east.
sentences.chinese: 海鷗斜着翅膀迎着海風朝灰暗淒涼的東方飛去。

sentences.english: He was good at slicing the ball across the court.
sentences.chinese: 他很善於把球斜打過場。

sentences.english: Legs closed, slightly tilted to one side。
sentences.chinese: 兩腿併攏，輕微斜向一側。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of Scnedesmus obliquus were studied by transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 透射電鏡觀察了斜生柵藻的細胞超微結構。

sentences.english: Gear Box uses the two-stage transmission made up of spiral cone-shaped gear and columned bevel wheel;
sentences.chinese: 減速器採用螺旋錐齒輪，圓柱斜齒輪二級傳動。

sentences.english: The shell not-rotation is the important technical requirement for planetary cross-mill.
sentences.chinese: 軋件不轉是行星斜軋機軋製的重要工藝要求。

sentences.english: The horse should maintain the same cadence throughout the whole movement.
sentences.chinese: 在做斜橫步期間，馬應保持節奏不變。

sentences.english: The winds were contrary;we had to beat about for two days.
sentences.chinese: 正碰上逆風，我們的船隻好迎斜風行駛了兩天。

sentences.english: Tea hatchback has more than 300 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 斜背產茶已有300多年的歷史。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprelisting; helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼瞼從眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹開，幫手提拔肌膚。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
